name: The timeworn sandals of the wayfarer
data: It increases the users dexterity noticably.
It increases the users constitution noticably.
It has adequate armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'tumble'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'power kick'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
